name: Kommissar Kugelblitz: Das Geheimnis von Spooky Hill
description: Sin descripción

name: Open Course
description: Fun Exciting Island Golf! Test your ability on this challenging island golf course, where precision is needed for every shot!!!

name: Dance of Decapods
description: A minimalist single screen bullet hell where your space insect must survive waves of enemies. Evolve to fight back with more than 30 different parts, from bio weapons to bullet enhancement.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008
description:
Experience the beautiful game like never before with Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 for the Nintendo DS. Bringing the authentic feel of professional soccer to your handheld, this game combines stunning visuals, fluid gameplay, and deep tactical options to deliver an unparalleled football experience on the go.

Play as your favorite teams and players from top leagues and international squads, all updated for the 2008 season. The game’s intuitive controls and dual-screen setup allow for precise dribbling, passing, and shooting, making every match a test of skill and strategy.

Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 features multiple game modes to cater to every type of player. Dive into the immersive Master League, where you manage your team through seasons, handling transfers, training, and tactics. Enjoy quick matches or tournaments for instant action, or take on specific challenges to hone your skills.

The DS’s touch screen functionality enhances gameplay, enabling quick formation changes and strategic adjustments on the fly. Engage in wireless multiplayer matches with friends to prove who the ultimate soccer champion is.

With its realistic animations, lifelike sound effects, and detailed player models, Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 captures the essence of the sport. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a newcomer to the series, this game offers a rich and engaging football experience that fits right in your pocket.

Step onto the pitch and lead your team to glory in Pro Evolution Soccer 2008 for the Nintendo DS.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008
description: Mobile phone port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2008.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008
description: The PlayStation 2 port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2008, adapted to work in weaker hardware.

name: Diddy Kong Racing: GoldenEye
description:
This is a 4 level track pack featuring GoldenEye textures, sounds, and assets. The levels included are:

Temple: Replaces Ancient Lake.

Basement Archives: Replaces Fossil Canyon.

Surface: Replaces Jungle Falls.

Runway: Replaces Hot Top Volcano.

name: Shootout At Old Tucson
description: Shootout at Old Tucson is a live-action laserdisc video game, released by American Laser Games in 1994 in the arcade. The game saw a limited production run and was the only release by the company never to be ported from the arcade. Soon after the game appeared on the market, American Laser Games went out of business, which, along with technical issues which limited its popularity in the arcades, further contributed to the title's obscurity. Shootout at Old Tucson was also one of the first games by American Laser Games developed based on 3DO technology. The game was filmed at Old Tucson Studios.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2009
description: PSP port of PES 2009.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2009
description: Port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2009 for mobile phone.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2009
description: PlayStation 2 port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2009.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010
description: PlayStation 2 port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010
description: PlayStation Portable port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010
description: iOS port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2010.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
description: PSP port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2011.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2011
description: Smartphone port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2011.

name: Duck Hunt
description:
Duck Hunt is a shooting simulation where the player goes out with his faithful dogs to hunt ducks. It requires the use of the Zapper light gun. In game modes A and B, players view a swampland from a first-person perspective. The dog scares the ducks out of the swamp, one at a time in mode A or two at a time in mode B. The ducks go flying around in the air and the player has three shots and a limited amount of time to shoot the ducks before they fly away. Each round only allows a limited number of misses in order to move on successfully. As the rounds progress, the ducks begin flying faster and faster, and fewer misses are allowed. In game mode A, a second player can control the movement of the duck using a controller plugged into port 2.

Mode C features target practice on clay pigeons rather than ducks. The perspective and rules here are the same, with only three shots to destroy two clay pigeons before they disappear off the horizon. Destroy enough clay pigeons to move on to the next, tougher round.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012
description: PS2 and PSP port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2012.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2012
description: Mobile phone port Pro Evolution Soccer 2012.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2013
description: PS2 port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2013.

name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014
description: The PlayStation 2 port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2014.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 2014
description: The Nintendo 3DS port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2014, released only in Japan.

name: eFootball PES 2020
description: The Android and iOS port of eFootball PES 2020.

name: eFootball 2022
description: The Android and iOS ports of eFootball 2022.

description: Sin descripción

name: J.League Winning Eleven 6
description: J.League Winning Eleven 6, released in 2002, was the second J.League entry on PlayStation 2. It was based on World Soccer: Winning Eleven 6, developed by KCET (Konami Computer Entertainment Tokyo) and published by Konami.

name: J.League Winning Eleven 2007 Club Championship
description: Sin descripción

name: J.League Winning Eleven 2008 Club Championship
description: Sin descripción

name: J.League Winning Eleven 2009 Club Championship
description: Sin descripción

name: J.League Winning Eleven 2010 Club Championship
description: J-League Winning Eleven 2010 Club Championship is an addition to the Winning Eleven J-League series. This game is the successor to the J-League Winning Eleven 2009 Club Championship and only features club teams (no national teams) and teams from both tiers of the J. League (totalling 36 teams). The game also features 118 foreign teams from the Premier League, Ligue 1, Serie A, Eredivisie, Primera División and a selection of teams from other leagues. This game will become the last edition of J-League Winning Eleven series.

name: J.League Winning Eleven Tactics
description: Sin descripción

name: Winning Eleven Tactics: European Club Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Pimp My Water Gun
description: "Pimp My Water Gun" is a tile-based 2D squirt gun builder. The player selects stock-parts from a library and arranges them in "builds" on a canvas. Your aim is to score a high "Coolness" rating. Parts and their logics have a meaning within your build. Reasonable designs with a high degree of customization beat uninspired builds. It's a "kitbashing" simulator and a creative challenge.

name: Moonday
description:
One night a UFO crashes somewhere in rural fields. Ushitsuki, local farmer (and a cow girl) finds the alien who now needs to repair his space ship using colors hidden in Ushitsuki's dreams.

Moonday is heavily inspired by Yume Nikki and shares some mechanics with it - exploration of dream worlds via going to bed, finding/equipping special "effects" which change character's appearance/abilities, etc.

name: Catabasis
description:
Rescue your brother from an untimely demise.
As you explore circles of the afterlife, you may learn a “Pentacle”.
These “Pentacles” can be drawn to bend angels to your will.

name: Fairy in a Jar
description:
Fairy in a Jar is a short but enchanting fairytale. It tells the story of a fairy who lost their memory and was kept in a jar by a human.

The fairy awakens in the glass enclosure with no memories. From the moment they open their eyes, the little fairy sees nothing but white lights. They meet Mr. Giant, who is scary but also a bit clumsy...

In a completely unknown world, with limited living space and a captor who speaks a different language... What should the fairy choose? To escape this prison, or...?

name: Mighty Action X
description: Mighty Action X is a Japanese video game developed by 7thChord and Bandai Namco Entertainment exclusively for the Nintendo 3DS. It was created as a means to promote Kamen Rider Ex-Aid, and is available only through a download code from purchasing All Kamen Rider: Rider Revolution.

name: Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!
description: The authorized mobile game "Bakusou Kyoudai Let's & Go!!" , will take you back to your childhood, and have a classic mini 4WD race! Come on Let's & Go!

name: A Neko Story
description: A Neko Story is a visual novel game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Hakuoki Zuisouroku Portable
description: A port for PSP.

name: Hakuoki Zuisouroku DS
description:
Port of Hakuoki Zuisouroku for the Nintendo DS.

Zuisouroku fills in the gaps in the Hakuouki story. You can see the everyday lives of Chizuru and the Shinsengumi members. Discover secrets that the men didn't tell you in the original game and unlock scenarios that are only mentioned briefly in the main story.

name: Hakuoki Zuisouroku Omokagebana
description: A port that adds scenario.

name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku Portable
description: Port of Hakuoki Reimeiroku for the Playstation Portable. Contains extra side story original to the PSP version.

name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku DS
description: A port for DS.

name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku Nagorigusa
description:
Port of Hakuoki Reimeiroku for the PS3.

Years before the beginning of Hakuouki, the Shinsengumi was known as the Mibu Roushigumi. A wandering young man named Ibuki Ryuunosuke falls in with the group by chance just after they first come to Kyoto, and while grudgingly making friends with the members within, witnesses the dawning era of the Shinsengumi.

name: Hakuoki Reimeiroku Omohase Sora
description:
Port of Hakuoki Reimeiroku for the PS Vita with new CGs.

Years before the beginning of Hakuouki, the Shinsengumi was known as the Mibu Roushigumi. A wandering young man named Ibuki Ryuunosuke falls in with the group by chance just after they first come to Kyoto, and while grudgingly making friends with the members within, witnesses the dawning era of the Shinsengumi.

name: Star Wars: Open World
description:
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...
We are uprooted from our home and thrown into this galaxy far, far away for the first time, experiencing it from an outsider's perspective. Abducted by slavers and recovering from the initial shock we are left with no choice but to join a small crew planning an escape from captivity, all the while the rising tide of the newly founded galactic empire sweeps across the galaxy!

Embark on an engaging choice-driven story which will take you across different planets in the Star Wars universe during the very early years of the galactic empire and their push for supremacy.

name: Animal Fight Club: Australia Export
description: Sin descripción

name: Gumboots Australia
description: You start with almost no money and must travel from town to town looking for answers. Travelling isn't free of course so on the way you must do odd jobs to earn money to travel with car, bus, or airplane. Of course travelling with car or plane is the fastest but they're also the costliest. You've gotta take into account how much time you still have to solve the mystery otherwise you might have to ask your bosses for an extension. You have about eight chances to extend your deadline but each extension takes away a bonus point. Use your time wisely and accept jobs that pay the highest for the least amount of days to get to your destination.

name: An Average Day at the Cat Café
description:
Cats, ducks, and mysterious beings galore.

All manners of creatures line down the block to get your signature drinks!
But how long can you keep the cafe open, when strange customers arise in the night?

name: Snow
description: The story of Snow starts when the main protagonist Izumo Kanata visits a small village called Ryujinmura (village of the dragon god) to help his cousin Tsugumi manage a local hotel with hot springs. In the village there is an old legend: In ancient times, the village is protected by the dragon goddess. However, one day the dragon goddesses fell in love with a human, which is strictly forbidden, and this incident finally caused the village to be always covered by snow after that. The game then tells the daily life of the protagonist in the village, and finally links the story to the legend of dragon goddess.

name: Ante Holic
description: Ante Holic is a small prequel to Ego Holic, set in the same universe, featuring 11k words, 15 CGs, painted backgrounds noir-style and grumpy demons.

name: Invisible Sign: Isu
description:
Fifteen years ago main character's older brother Rin got kidnapped. As a result mother went mad and father lost interest in life, so family's private psychiatrist had to care of the young Shun. The boy starts to attend school with his only friend but a dreadful murder of student occurs there one day. Shun starts to see visions of the killed student and nightmares where some man wants to catch him. Overcome with fear, he occasionally loses control over his consciousness.
A police investigator finds a lot of similarities of this murder with the case fifteen years ago. People around Shun get involved in the investigation, including a classmate girl with the same name as his disappeared brother.
Will the mystery be revealed?

name: Invisible Sign: Isu - Nemureru Mori
description: It is still a story about the mystery of the unsolved incident happened 20 years ago that has something to do with present suspicious events, but the main difference is in the big number of different endings. There are also new characterswith their own stories and endings and the possibility to see the true end with the eyes of another protagonist.

name: Kaze no Satsui: It's a Long Way Round
description: Six members of the broadcasting club gather at a villa in the mountains for a farewell party for former club director Haruki who leaves for the USA. Main character Kazuya secretly has romantic feelings for the members of the club. He organizes this this farewell party with quite a few surprises.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Empires - Free Alliances Version
description:
In the Free Alliances Version of Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires, you can enjoy a selection of the features from the retail version, including the ability to play Invasion and Defensive battles in Free Mode.
You can also enjoy playing online with players who own the retail version.

It is also possible to import save data from the Free Alliances Version into the retail version of the game!

name: Ghosted
description: The town of Falling Springs is a dreamy slice of small-town Americana: quiet, beautiful, neighborly, quaint. But within the neighborhood lies a secret of supernatural proportions, and its unveiling will bring your love life back from the dead. Literally.

name: Anata wa Akumade Watashi no Mono
description:
The protagonist, Akito Asagumo, was on a summer trip with his close classmates. There, at his friend's villa on an unpopulated island, Akito becomes involved in a horrific murder.

A suspense BL visual novel.

name: Last Bet
description:
--Around 4:30 pm on June 5, a male student (14) from a private junior high school fell from the roof of the school he was attending. The boy died shortly after the fall at the hospital he was transferred to.

The police treated the case as an accident and the investigation was over. A bad event that happened unexpectedly. The misfortune that happened unexpectedly and unintentionally.

Is it okay to end this tragedy that happened about a month ago as an accident?

name: Shounen D no Kokuhaku
description:
A super short melancholy BL game with the theme of adolescence and juvenile delinquency.
A certain prefecture public high school had 2 consecutive murder cases on September 7, 1997.
Autumn is a week after the opening ceremony after the summer vacation.
It is a bizarre murder case that occurred in an ordinary public high school.
It was a brutal and bizarre murder, and the fact that all the victims were boys and girls in the same class shook the world.
Also, the fact that the criminal who was the perpetrator was a boy student in the same class made a lot of noise.

name: Tsumannai
description:
"Who killed her?"

The main character, Amasawa Minato, had a lover named Nanaka Watanabe. However, one day, Nanaka is killed by someone.

A short BL visual novel.

name: Sugar-Coated
description:
My only immediate family died. I relied on my uncle and moved to Mokari village, where my father's home was.
The words that cross my head are words relentlessly repeated since childhood.
"Suoh, no matter what, I will never return to that village. Even if its body is destroyed, the demon's grudge will never go away."
Surrounded by friendly friends and beautiful features, gradually getting used to a new life.
The world peeped at the poison under the sugar coating, as if watching it.

name: Ukubata Tei no Roku Tengu
description: Sin descripción

name: Woods of Disturbance
description: You woke up in the middle of the forest, next to you is a freshly dug grave, your hands are tied and you don't remember how you ended up here. You must survive and get out of this forest at any cost.

name: Ceaseless Night
description: Ceaseless Night is a strategic roguelike that captures the essence of dungeon crawling in a bleak world. In a world of stolen sunlight, the flickering flames of a campfire lure unwitting travelers to face the dungeons below. Conquer the dungeons, defeat the Lich King, and end this Ceaseless Night!

name: Daikaijuu no Gyakushuu
description: An overhead run-and-gun game in which a kaiju terrorizes an island.

name: Horny Elves and a Moral Orc
description: ased on a 4-panel comic by Tomokichi about the only suvivor of the orc tribe and a pervert elf who gets aroused by the orc.

name: Meitantei Shikkaku na Kanojo
description: There is a boarding high school. Konoha meets a girl on the entrance ceremony day. Her name is Karen and she suddenly says to Konoha, "You're the culprit." According to her, the mysterious thief who sent theft notice to the school the other day is Konoha. She doesn't know what's going on, but Karen believes that Konoha is the culprit...

name: Ren'ai Shoshinsha
description:
Nozomi, who works at the detective office of Une, will be asked to infiltrate the boys' school with the childhood friend Karin!
A thrilling trouble-loving comedy!

name: Utakata no Hana ga Chiru
description:
Karen, head of the Literature Club, accompanied her childhood friend Himawari, from the Photography Club, to attend the drama club's training camp as a photographer.

At the training camp, twins Asagao and Yuugao asked Himawari to participate with them. After greeting each club member and being shown around the mansion, Karen and the others participate in the rehearsal as photographers.

The next day, a corpse is found in the mansion's greenhouse.

Is this an accident or an incident?

name: Guzhuyizhi de Mingtian
description: Sin descripción

name: Shinoda Shinjuku Tantei Jimusho Karajishi Botan
description:
The protagonist - Usui Yoshihito works at Shinoda Shinjuku Detective Agency.
The agency received a classified assignment from the Shinjuku Central PD.
A joint-investigation behind the wide-spread drug smuggling route within Shinjuku area.

His partner from the police department, Agumo is a diligent detective.
Having a shady past, he feels umcomfortable working with Agumo,
but the job itself is right up his alley.
Soon, the undercover operation begins.

In the meanwihle, he encounters a mafia named Hata, who seems to know Usui's past...

name: Youka no Sono
description: Sin descripción

name: Borderline Detective
description: Sin descripción

name: Itoshi no My Master
description:
Once there lived a normal madam and maid in a village.
They were perfectly normal.
Normal life, normal relationship, but kind of abnormal.
This is how things changed.

name: PokéROM: Sunflora
description: 1 of 30 collectible discs in the Mystery Series of PokéROMs.

name: PokéROM: Blissey
description: Sin descripción

name: Nioh 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Nioh 2: Digital Deluxe Edition is a special edition of the action role-playing game Nioh 2, developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo. Released alongside the base game in March 2020, this edition includes the full game and additional digital content. It features the Season Pass, granting access to all three DLC expansions: The Tengu's Disciple, Darkness in the Capital, and The First Samurai. Additionally, it includes exclusive in-game items such as the Demon Horde weapons and armour set, as well as a Kodama Netsuke charm.

name: Ghostbusters Arcade
description: Ghostbusters Arcade is a video redemption game developed by the arcade masters at Play Mechanix for ICE. Players confront ghosts on two levels which are based on events from the first two Ghostbuster films. They then have to stop the Stay Puft Marshmellow man for the chance at a big ticket bonus!

name: Tower Song: Eternal Knight
description:
This is a playable prelude to the game that became Tower Song.

Short story told in the RPG Maker MZ engine, with turn-based combat and top-down exploration. Players build a four-character party from seven different playable characters and classes (berserker, brawler, engineer, hedge witch, knight, mystic and sniper).

The land is plagued by monsters and earthquakes, but a group of plucky adventurers are out to set things right. Little do they know their mission is already doomed - and at the hands of one of their own.

name: Tales of Vesperia
description:
The Japan-exclusive PlayStation 3 version of Tales of Vesperia features full-voice acting, nearly doubling the size of the script of the original Xbox 360 version. New songs, towns, and dungeons have been added. Other major changes include new quests, bosses, skits, and story elements. New gameplay additions are introduced, such as higher Overlimit levels, more artes, mystic artes, equipment, and character costumes.

Flynn becomes a permanent party member later in the story, and Patty Fleur, an entirely new character, also joins the party as a playable member. Other side characters are also added, such as characters from the prequel anime film "Tales of Vesperia: The First Strike."

name: Magical Drop VI
description:
The legendary Japanese arcade game is back! Choose your favorite character—will it be World, the Overseer of the Magical Land, the mighty Justice, or the devious Black Pierrot?—and play in one of the numerous game modes available.

Solve diabolical puzzles or beat strong opponents in Arcade match. Follow an adventure in Story or Path of Destiny modes, full of twists and turns.
Challenge your friends and the best players online!

name: Ben 10: Blockade Blitz
description: You can play in story mode or in free play. In story mode, you progress farther into the game. In free play, you play for fun. Use the mouse to prevent to ball from falling and to destroy the bricks. You must destroy all the bricks and all the enemies to advance to the next level. Collect Omnitrix symbols to transform into one of 6 aliens for a limited amount of time (XLR8, Heatblast, Stinkfly, Cannonbolt, Wildvine, and Ripjaws). Use the mouse to fire (only Stinkfly, Heatblast, and Wildvine can shoot projectiles). If you lose, Ben gets recaptured and goes back into his restrains of those similar to the episode Secrets except there are all 4 cylinders this time as seen in a brief cameo on the episode Gwen 10.

name: Pumpkin Spice Paradise
description: A quirky adventure game involving Pumpkin Spice Lattes!

name: Pumpkin Spice Paradise 2
description: A quirky adventure sequel involving Pumpkin Spice Lattes!

name: Asphalt 3: Street Rules 3D HD
description: Asphalt 3: Street Rules 3D HD is rocketing onto your mobile phone! Exclusive for the Symbian OS9 Devices. The third installment of the most famous mobile phone racing game throws you right into the heart of the underground racing world. Take the wheel of your dream car or bike and make a name for yourself at the 4 corners of the world in amazing 3D surroundings. Force your opponents off the road and avoid the police roadblocks to attract TV helicopters filming your exploits live!

name: Contra: Locked 'N' Loaded
description: Contra: Locked 'N' Loaded is a run-n-gun shooter developed as an attempt to remake the original Konami classic, Contra, using the OpenBOR engine. It features more playable characters and 3 missions, with two additional stages that can be unlocked.

name: Asphalt 4: Elite Racing HD
description: Face the world's richest drivers in high-speed races through traffic. Choose among 10 dream cars and bikes from the world's most prestigious manufacturers, such as Ferrari and Bugatti, and zoom through the streets of Monte Carlo, New York, Shanghai, Paris, Dubai, and Beverly Hills to impose your style. Check your rides in your own garage and spend millions to tune them. The police await you in each city with roadblocks and helicopters to try and confiscate your expensive toy, so you'll need to drive to the limit to avoid them. Can you become the ultimate VIP of urban racing?

name: Playnicky
description: Nicky is playing on your protocol stage. It's still a bit empty. But not for long! Help Nicky throw an awesome party! Run! Slide! Jump! Fly! Gather crew, customize your stage, unlock new music and watch your event grow.

name: I'm looking for 3024 people
description: Can you run, swim and use a shotgun without your eyes? —I'm looking for 3024 people is an alternate reality game whose story spans from 1974 to the present. In the continuation of this adventure, you will have to complete missions with other players and participate in a blind experiment.

name: SingStar: SuomiHelmet
description: Sin descripción

name: Oathbreakers
description: Oathbreakers is a multiplayer open-world fantasy VR RPG that incorporates a unique blend of strategic precision-based realtime action combat, with unrestricted player vs player competitiveness, in a relaxing survival RPG themed environment.

name: Quriocity
description: Quriocity is a sci-fi city builder game set on a bare alien planet very similar to Earth. Build and upgrade a wide variety of units to extract resources and provide services, such as maintenance, food production, education, entertainment and many more.

name: Stroke the Spider
description:
There are many out there that are scared of spiders, and those that would never touch one.

Well now you can stroke one without the fear of it jumping on you. Just stick out your hand and stroke it, let your fears float away.

name: The Jumping Wrap
description: Join BIG W on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Donut Fun
description: Donut Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Halloween Candy Fun
description: Halloween Candy Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Shining Gadget
description: Shining Gadget is a passive creature collecting idle game that transforms your Playdate into an online-enabled specter catcher! Take aim at ghosts and suck them into your Playdate using the built-in crank! Keep your tractor beam on target to weaken the ghost and crank for maximum pull! Your precision and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test as you collect ancient and powerful spirits!

name: Escapepion
description: A Short Shooting Game for Playdate

name: Thwack
description: Funky-legged tennis

name: Owl Rescue
description: Owl Rescue sounds the alarm! A class full of young post owls has been kidnapped! Help their teacher Keeper discover their whereabouts. Follow the trail of the kidnapper through a mix of Hidden Object and Match 3 gameplay. Discover the clues that will lead you to the thief with the help of companion Bella. Take flight with Owl Rescue today!

name: Kayko & Kokosh Coloring Book: Deluxe Edition
description: The humorous strips follow the story of two warriors that do everything they can to defend their beloved castle of Mirmilovo from attacks by the evil order of Knaveknights. Kayko is the clever, resourceful and lovable kind of a hero, while Kokosh is mor…

name: Snowballs
description: Join a group of adorable Preschoolers on their Christmas adventure. Enjoy the newest episode of the first Nintendo Switch cartoon mixed with a coloring book.

name: Invocation: The Festival of Souls
description: Get ready for the characters of the famous faces of history to take on each other in the arena!

name: The Preschoolers: Season 1
description: Preschoolers is the first Nintendo Switch children cartoon mixed with a color book. Listen to a story of a noisy neighbour who gets a well deserved lesson in humility. Join the Preschoolers on a heartwarming visit to the ZOO and learn why even rowdy mo…

name: Fragment's Note+
description: This is story that ties the future together...

name: Grand Foodventure
description: This game will satisfy your inner food lover's hunger!

name: Project Gotham Racing: Mobile
description: Project Gotham Racing: Mobile is an adaptation for mobile devices of the Xbox-exclusive Project Gotham Racing series. The game contains eight licensed cars and three cities (London, Paris and San Francisco) with three courses for each location. The available game modes are a solo career and a time trial mode. The solo career consists of several championships with multiple events. By completing them a next championship can be unlocked. There are regular street races against other cars, but also drifting challenges.

name: Merge Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Gotham Racing: Ferrari Edition
description: Project Gotham Racing: Ferrari Edition is a spin-off of the main Project Gotham Racing series and this release is exclusive to Zune. The game contains single-player and multiplayer races with twelve exotic sports cars licensed from Ferrari. In single-player there are regular races in 33 events in the career mode as well as time trials. In the time trials it is possible to race against ghost cars and share records with friends. Multiplayer lets the player race against up to three players in wireless network races. The racing tracks are set in London, New York and Tokyo. The game makes use of touch for controls. There are two virtual buttons, one in the bottom right (acceleration) and one in the bottom left (brake) of the screen, along with a handbrake in the middle. Steering is done by tilting the device.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Challenge Accepted
description: Sin descripción

name: Reality Rash
description: Reality Rash is a 3D beat 'em up inspired by classics such as Jackie Chan Stuntmaster, Streets of Rage, and TMNT... Action takes place in 4 different worlds each one with unique enemies! Play solo or in 2 player co-op, It’s a nostalgic and modern beat 'em up!

name: Number 99
description: Number 99 is a futuristic Rogue Racing Game throughout the galaxy. 50% driving and 50% fight on the track. Upgrading your ship is vital for the victory and don’t be afraid to talk dirty to the opponents, or even hack their ships to ensure your 1rst place in the end.

name: Bones of Halloween
description: How long can you survive the night of the pumpkin skeletons? A small but spooky first-person shooter with a Halloween theme

name: Abstract Grind
description: A simple short survival roguelite where you build you character by picking up various skills and boons.

name: RandoMine
description: In RandoMine, meet four would-be demigods, whose aspirations are thwarted in a sudden calamitous misfortune instigated by their own avarice. Explore gloomy caves, mysterious ruins, and much more. Survive creatures and traps, and plunder hidden riches.

name: Step By Step Hero
description: A Walking Simulator Adventure in a randomized world where every step counts!

name: Joy Flight
description: Joy Flight is an open world VR flight game where players will explore, unlock runways with daring landings and complete missions across a large chain of islands!

name: Symbol Sudoku
description: Classic Sudoku, but with a twist--solve the game using Greek symbols.

name: Elin
description: Successor to the roguelike RPG "Elona". Adventure, survival, crafting, home-building, myths passed down, and stories of humans and Elea spun. What scars will you leave on the land of Ylva?

name: Never Rain
description: Enter a mysterious village, cursed by an evil entity. Discover what happened to its residents and survive against what lurks in the darkness. Never Rain is a singleplayer horror experience waiting for the player to unveil its secrets.

name: Kind Heart Defenders
description: Kind Heart Defenders is an experience that brings the best of Space Shooter with the best of Tower Defense. Have fun building towers, trying different ships, laughing at the characters' jokes, and battling through intergalactic scenarios and gigantic bosses.

name: Stagdraft
description: Top-down 2D Pixel PvP set on Medieval Fantasy World Deploy to battle in Teambased PvP attempting to Capture Flags, Defeating Players, Looting NPCs, Defeat Bosses Gather, Craft, Battle, Loot your way up to conquer the Kingdoms

name: Memory Traces: Egypt
description: Memory Traces:Egypt. is a 3D puzzle game where the player needs to repair destroyed artifacts.

name: Deadly Harvest
description: Defend your farm from an invasion of evil pumpkins in this spooky casual roguelite! Upgrade your weapons and retrieve mystical artifacts to keep the horde at bay and uncover the secret to defeating the legendary Headless Horseman.

name: Chip Off the Ol' Stumbling Block
description: A physics-based runner where you weave between obstacles, set off explosives, and use your environment to reach the end. Travel through five unique environments, conquer nine different obstacle types, and make it to the other side in one piece!

name: Where is Earth?
description: Where is Earth is a top-down vehicular combat game. Traverse planets, evading threats and obstacles, in search of your crew. Gather resources to assemble upgrades, landing vehicles, space craft, weaponry and support modules to aid you in your fight against an unknown enemy.

name: Demiurges
description: Demiurges is a strategic roguelike game. Build your deck, develop your city, upgrade your heroes, and defeat your enemies in turn-based battles to save your world from destruction. Immerse yourself in a rich fantasy world. Collect new cards to create new strategies and increase your chances.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 9
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: A Bit of Tactics
description: In the farms of Abitof monsters are grown for their yield of rare items. But a successful harvest is not easy, for these crops fight back. As with all creatures their hearts yearn for tactics. Use this as your advantage, progress through the dungeon defeat their boss and reap the rewards.

name: Book of Coin
description: Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy world that is inspired by traditional text-based adventure and interactive fiction games.

name: Routemania
description: Routemania is a relaxing, colorful puzzle game where you build routes around the world. Solve 25+ puzzles by discovering the most efficient way to connect cities using your available pieces.

name: The Land Beneath Us
description: The Land Beneath Us is a turn-based rogue-lite action dungeon crawler. Use powerful skill combos and stylish weaponry to battle your way through the Underworld known as Annwn. Defeat the Seven Lords and rescue The Creator and her vital Soul-Tech.

name: Helmscape
description: The Hand awaits. Helmscape is a roguelite action RPG where you control a party of fantasy heroes. Survive hordes of enemies, try different team combos, find legendary items, and explore hand-crafted maps with challenging objectives.

name: Dreadhunter
description: Plough through hordes of deadly monsters and defeat vicious bosses in an intense fast paced shooter RPG where all items are “legendary”, levels are ever-changing and combat is razor-sharp.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 8
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Orbtangle
description: Orbtangle is a simplistic puzzle game which requires you to swap the positions of orbs in order to untangle the lines with which they are connected.

name: CyberTD
description: Help protect the core of cyberspace from mutant viruses in this innovative tower defense game packed with roguelite elements! Will you be able to build the ultimate line of defense?

name: Monstir Iradicator
description: Monstir Iradicator is a game about saving the galaxy of Icoa, Transverse 4 different planets and destroy the Monstirs residing there. This game is based off of games like Asteroids following a similar Shoot 'Em Up style gameplay.

name: Closer to Home
description: Closer To Home is a dialogue-focused walking simulator with light puzzle elements and item collection. Navigate connections between reality and dreams, look for weird stuff and make friends. There is no reason to fear death.

name: Jump'n'Brawl
description: Jump'n'Brawl is a 2D brawling game where two to four players compete for the highest score.

name: Missing Pieces
description: Missing Pieces is a story-driven adventure in a vibrant alien world, full of hidden secrets, a plethora of languages and a sparkling cast of characters: lovable rogues, heartbroken families, and questionable allies. Find friendship and love, learn about yourself and discover who you really are!

name: Sinister Entity
description: Third-Person horror game . The game contains many puzzles and mysteries. The game contain escaping and hiding from evil entity.

name: Crystal Defender
description: This is Crystal Defender, there are dangers at every turn. You, as an engineer, need to fight off waves of opponents who want to destroy the world crystals that help you survive.

name: Idle Intergalactic Factory
description: Collect minerals from the planet and build various elements, items, and equipment. Build weapons to destroy planetary species and occupy planets.

name: Digit Factory
description: 《Digit Factory》 is a game that allows you to give full play to your creativity and enjoy the fun of thinking. Design your own pipeline to perform calculations on various combinations of numbers. In the endless demand, find a design that responds to changes with the same. Come , challenge your mind!

name: IceLine
description: The game "Iceline" is the story of the Ice Magician, who collects magic crystals and takes his skills to the next level. This is a puzzle game with unique mechanics in which the player character leaves an ice trail behind him and thus changes the playing field for himself!

name: Gust
description: A retro 2.5D action-runner game settled in a dark world. Race with other players for a spot in the global leaderboard. Interact with your spells. Pass challenging levels. Run and fight for your life to reach absolution.

name: Puny BOB
description: Puny BOB - Explore the bright fantasy world of the Mediterranean kingdom! Meet unusual characters and help them complete their tasks by making difficult decisions. Your journey is unique - these stories tell the story of a simple farmer.

name: Pip 5
description: Pip 5 - cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Poly Puzzle: Dinosaurs
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with dinosaurs.

name: On Dark Terms
description: Explore an online co-op open-world horror void of hope and shadowed by darkness where you and your feline companion will investigate a post-apocalyptic world searching for evidence so that you might piece together the story that started it all and hopefully find a way to end it.

name: The Lies We Tell Ourselves
description: The Lies We Tell Ourselves is an episodic first person psychological action-adventure game with introspective/horror elements and a focus on subtle storytelling and atmosphere.

name: Midnight Calling: Wise Dragon - Collector's Edition
description: A visit to your father takes a dark turn as you find your hometown in flames! Your only hope is to find the Wise Dragon, but are they friend or foe? It’s up to you to find out!

name: Computer Physics Simulator 2023
description: Computer Physics Simulator 2023 - sequel of CPS 2020, innovation simulator about construct PC with physics of parts. There you can using operating system, using security camera(for watch street), listen music, watching videos and photos, play in games of different eras of game industry.

name: Talon's Blade
description: Talon's Blade is a third person adventure RPG with an advanced direction based melee combat system. Experience the journey of Marcus Veridius as he is set on the path of vengeance. Explore a world plagued with war and corruption as the very foundations of an empire crumble around you.

name: Dragonspire
description: Embark on an epic journey into the anime world of Asteria. Bring your friends along and delve into endlessly different scenarios in this action-packed cooperative roguelike.

name: Cult: Chapter One
description: Find what you came for and escape, before they get what they want...

name: Vajont VR
description: This interactive first-person VR experience is set in the Vajont valley, some hours before the disaster. A wife and her husband are talking about their future: the woman senses the danger and wants to leave; her husband dismisses the idea of danger. The player will determine the end of their story.

name: RogueType
description: Typing RogueLite

name: Alexandria IV
description: Tasked with commanding of one of the most challenging sectors of the galaxy, the future of the Alexandria IV space station depends on your diplomatic and strategic capabilities. How far will you go to prevent a war?

name: The Dark Crown: Genesis
description: 2d, rogue-lite, action platformer, pixel art game. It is about the transition of darkness, which is the 6th and last main element, to humanity.

name: Planet Surfer
description: Dodge Obstacles. Purchase upgrades. Save the world. Planet Surfer is a non-stop anti-gravity survival racer and the ultimate forward scrolling don’t run into stuff game developed as a love letter to the temple run quintet and the early 3d sonic games.

name: Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum
description: Garbage Pail Kids are back in this Long-Lost, All-New platforming adventure. Featuring four playable characters, six secret-filled levels, and a trading-card system, Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum is a throwback to the golden era of 80s gaming.

name: Punzel: Chapter I - Toujours la Meme Histoire
description: Imagine you are a captured princess...but the hero never arrives. Join Punzel in her adventure of trying to escape her tower prison. Experience the boredom of captivity, the daily frustrations of haggling with your captors and crows. Lots of crows.

name: Kitsu's Destiny
description: Kitsu's Destiny is a clicker-style RPG made in RPG Maker. It has a dynasty mechanic, the more damage you deal, the more Gold and Experience your get try again. You have equipment and boosts to purchase, and you get more powerful insignias as you go on. It's like speedrunning grinding!

name: Survivor!
description: Survivor! is an adventure roguelike game. In the game, you can endlessly harvest enemies, upgrade your skills, and defeat the menacing enemy army. Waves of legions are coming, ready for a battle of heroes?

name: Tiny Solar System
description: A single player space game where you fly a rocket around a tiny solar system with realistic physics, including take off, orbiting, orbital transfers and landings. Help settling other planets and moons. No time limits, no stress. If you crash you just get rescued.

name: Area: Zero
description: Show your fighting skills and teamwork! In the new Slovak Sci-Fi game, you will find yourself in the shoes of an operator or a monster. Your work in the skin of the operator will fulfill various tasks on the map and avoid the bloodthirsty monster.

name: Evard the Hermit: Through Fears
description: Evard's gift and a curse — the ability to absorb other people's fears and phobias. Immerse yourself into Evard's story and discover the secret of his origins. Explore his medieval Metroidvania world, look for the sources of fears and overcome them.

name: Tilecraft
description: 'Tilecraft: A New Horizon' is a minimalist and relaxing strategy game about discovering and building on your explored tiles. Explore a procedurally generated set of resources across the map in this unique and casual atmosphere.

name: The Villager and the Werewolf
description: In this game, when you fit the last piece of each jigsaw, you will hear a fantastic werewolf story written by Marta Machado and illustrated by Alexandre Rocha.

name: Counterpact
description: Fight against other players or take on the Gilded Spire in this 2D platform-shooter. Customize and play as one of seven characters with unique mechanics and items.

name: Trains: Through Electric Storms.
description: There is an insane electrical revolution in the world of the XX Century. Anna’s father left her before death a great but yet dangerous and mysterious legacy. Find all the answers in the tense world of tesla punk.

name: The Trader: Good Dealer Simulator
description: Build your own shop. Run the shop and buy new furnitures. Manage your own economy, buy 50 and above items and sell. To be successful, stay out of crime and serve your customers in a good manner.

name: Dosi
description: Explore an ominous dystopian city full of normal people with super powers.

name: Slime Ranger
description: You are on a quest to find and defeat the Slime King. With a limited movement, you need to think carefully about every step until you reach the door. Push boxes, find keys, beware of traps, and slay every slime that get in your way!

name: Supermarket Duck Dash
description: Knock products off the supermarket shelves and into your shopping cart with your wings, as you help old people by doing their grocery shopping for them. Featuring funky physics and over 125 products. How much money can you make before you run out of time?

name: Sokobear: Goo
description: An entire village threatened by yucky jelly goey creatures, and only Bear can save them! Explode the Goos by solving a sokoban style puzzle. Help Bear along the attacked places in his neighbourhood and be the hero amongst the Forest Folk.

name: Bunny Eureka
description: A cozy game. Build a bunny town, and take care of cute bunnies. grow plants and add buildings, and enjoy happy bunnies living in your town. Let these soft cute bunnies be with you.

name: Jester's Quest
description: ✓ Fairy tale metroidvania with some RPG elements ✓ Hand drawn pixelart with frame by frame animation ✓ Open world map to more than 50+ different levels ✓ Medieval fantasy with magic, quests and dragons ✓ You don't have to read a single line of text ✓ Combo combat system

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked
description: Jump, Dash, Collect! Play solo and with your friends and loved ones! Explore this cute 3D platformer where you play as Boti, a brave and adorable data bot. Join Boti on an adventure to save the cyber-world of Byteland from bugs and viruses!

name: I Did Not Buy This Ticket
description: A short horror story about losing your identity. Face your traumas while riding a mysterious bus.

name: Half-Life: VR Mod
description: A fan-made highly immersive Virtual Reality mod for the classic Half-Life from 1998.

name: First Bite: Bad Blood
description: An LGBTQ+ Vampiric Visual Novel. So you think you’re above the law because you’re undead and have perfect hair? Think again.

name: Phyakh
description: Story-driven, action adventure combining exploration with fast-paced combat games. Phyakh, a creature who was saved from death in bio-robotic suit. He comeback to help his wife from under arrested by invader, The army troop from the earth. Post-Nuclear war and virus epidemic swept the world.

name: Saturn Quest: R.U.N.E. 3000
description: Saturn Quest: R.U.N.E. 3000 is a tragic Alien Space Opera featuring asystematic Action-RTS battles and epic plot of mythological proportions.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XIV: Message in a Bottle
description: Help Hercules uncover the mystery of strange messages in bottles and save Olympian gods!

name: Push a Block
description: A simple but challenging 3D puzzle game.

name: A Spooky Teaparty
description: Take the role of Rover, Summer, Britton and Marina in this fun, exploration-based Halloween adventure that takes place just after the events of Aplestia! Find treats, solve puzzles, battle with spooky monsters, enter secret rooms and meet with undead, funny characters! Welcome to Duruduru Castle!

name: Klitorax
description: Hurry Up, Klitorax needs to find the next toillet! Faith is in your hands and if you dont hurry, it will also be in your pants . . . and on the floor . . .

name: Azazel's Christmas Fable
description: A wacky 8-bit retro-style point and click Christmas adventure, reminiscent of '90s classics. Explore Santa's village as a devilish imp with a mischievous knack for getting into trouble. Solve puzzles and uncover mysteries while meeting some peculiar characters along the way.

name: Walking in the Abyss
description: Explore a mysterious castle in the middle of the forest and discover its secrets in this 2D horror game.

name: Editor's Hell
description: It’s been two days since you assigned to the editor job on the newspaper. After months of unemployment; you just had to took it. Maybe you have no idea how to do this but; you have a family to look after. Dreams, nightmares, don’t matter anymore; you have a new opportunity in your life.

name: 2 of Me
description: Defy the ancient goddess of war and free the Agency from the forces and anomalies that have captured it in this scrolling shooter and action roguelike game.

name: Mount Farewell
description: Denial, anger, bargaining, depression and acceptance. Five stages to overcome on Mount Farewell. This game is a difficult 2D precision platformer about grief for those who like a challenge.

name: Voice of the Wizard by Brett Farkas
description: Voice of the Wizard is a 100% voice recognition controlled adventure game. Explore an open world of forests, fields, and shorelines. Learn spells, solve mysteries, and defeat enemies. It's up to you to be the Voice of the Wizard.

name: Empire of Revenant
description: An engaging Live2D visual novel with deep plot.

name: Together With Me
description: Rotate the obstacles with the mouse until the yellow and pink balls connect

name: Office Run: Halloween Run
description: New environment with spooky atmosphere and themed obstacles. Updated and improved gameplay of the base game’s Arcade mode introducing new cycle system and monsters hunting the player. You better run for your life!

name: ChaosWorld
description: A magically controlled medieval large map and a multiplayer survival open world game with randomly generated caves on the large map by the program. Use combat, building, farming, automating to create your own medieval village or town, and defeat magic with magic.

name: Chiky Poky
description: Chiky Poky is an old-school 2D puzzle inspired by games like The Key of Solomon and Caliper. Help Chiky to return the brother kidnapped by the portal from the mysterious forest.

name: Dead World Heroes
description: Dead World Heroes is an RTS-Action game in a Zombie setting. Travel the zombie-plagued country, collect supplies, build a team of survivors, crush the undead hordes!

name: Keep of the Witch
description: An Anime inspired 3D adventure game were you ascend a castle with puzzling and platforming, leading to Boss fights at the end of each floor. You are to save the princess with 4 separate characters, 8* different endings, and a maid that supports you along the way.

name: Space Intern
description: You finally got an internship in the intergalactic space station, congrats! Now you just need to survive on different planets, experience gravity inversion, and weightlessness, talk to burn-out workers, and of course - avoid getting killed by local aliens.

name: Don't Look Away
description: A frightening asymmetrical multiplayer experience! Survive as the Human or terrorize as the Entity that can only move when it isn't being watched.

name: Mirror 2: Project Z
description: We intend to create a 3D anime-style open-world simulation and management game, which has rich and relatively independent gameplay modules that can adapt to players with different tastes.

name: Galactic Story
description: Galactic Story - Top Down Shooter, the player is given a choice of three different types of spaceships, each of them is upgraded right during the game, dodging enemy projectiles, the player destroys enemies and collects various bonuses.

name: Glass Hearts
description: Gripping psychological thriller Yaoi game full of difficult choices. Can you trust your own mind?

name: Bunny Box Breakout
description: Break blocks. Rescue bunnies. Collect bunnies. All the bunnies. ALL THE BUNNIES.

name: Angel Droid
description: Vampire Survivors meets Magicka! Welcome to Angel Droid, the game of experimentation and reflection. Craft thousands of spells to fight demons within the human mind, whether the human wants the help or not.

name: The Demon Within Me
description: The Demon Within Me is a first-person psychological horror game featuring a dark, lonely, and atmospheric environment that offers an immersive and disturbing experience.

name: Troubleshooting
description: An FPS in your old family computer. Hunt a virus, fix the WiFi, and become an actual JPEG. Contains BSODs, a massive homework folder, and maybe even a paperclip. Your old computer needs you one last time.

name: Hot Cleopatra
description: The scorching sun of the desert pleasantly warms the skin, and the air is filled with the aroma of flowers growing near the palace. The mistress of seas, sands, and hearts is ready to travel the Nile.

name: Furry Love & Sex
description: Furry Love & Sex is a match3 game with live2D animations. Claw - the main character, performed dirty for the evil corporation Cosgrove tek. Then instead of paying him the corporation decided to kill him. Miraculously surviving he is now trying to repay the debt.

name: S&M Story
description: Discover the depths of your fetishes and kinks with EmyLiveShow stars Emy and Nia! Spend amazing hours in the company of beautiful v-tubers and find out their secrets!

name: The Retired Strategist's Way to Save the Country
description: This is a real-time strategy simulation game in which players develop their country while managing and operating its resources. Players are asked for help by various heroines, including elves, beastmen ......, and others, and command the armies of their countries.

name: Monstrous Love
description: Monstrous Love contains three adult short stories, focusing on women discovering their sexuality and freedom with gentle yet ferocious monsters. Be seduced by a world of love, sex, and claws in this sex-positive gaming experience!

name: Junjou Gal to Shiawase no Katachi: Shape of Happiness
description: A childhood friend reunited with you after several years has turned into a "Gyaru"!? Just how will the girl who loves the protagonist even after her makeover, and our troubled protagonist's relation turn out? Will they be able to find their shape of happiness?

name: My Mistress
description: My Mistress is a relaxing puzzle game that makes you happy. Finish the puzzle and enjoy yourself alone with the ladies!

name: My Therapist is a Futanari 2
description: A return visit to your new therapist leads to some unexpected developments. Since you didn't follow the instructions she gave you last time to a T, more severe measures will now have to be taken.

name: Heroes of Eroticism: New Beginnings
description: Experience the first 3 episodes of Heroes of Eroticism in this one convenient package, full of excitement, romance and tough choices. After having once been entirely eradicated, superpowers are suddenly returning. Will this generation handle them better than the last one?

name: Strip n Play with Valerie
description: Fun, quick, adult game with sexy women and amazing animated scenes!

name: Mosaique Neko Waifus 5
description: Unique hentai puzzle about flirting with cute anime Neko girls. "Neko Waifus" is a series loved by millions around the world.

name: The Survival of Sarah Rose
description: The Survival of Sarah Rose is an epic-fantasy erotic visual novel, following the life of the eldest daughter of the royal Rose family. When tragedy strikes, Sarah finds her once safe and stable life thrown into chaos.

name: 3 Seasons
description: A slice of life, romance and fantasy dating sim featuring 3 love interests, romance/friendship routes and an original soundtrack.

name: 8 Bit Rally
description:
Revisit the good old days of arcade racers with 8 bit Rally, the game developed by Photon Creations.
Race on tracks all around the world, through some of the harshest and picturesque environments against 19 other competitors all aiming for the prized 8 Bit Cup.

name: Family Tennis
description:
Family Tennis is Namco's first tennis game, it features a roster of sixteen players (twelve male and four female) all based on real-life professional tennis players at the time, such as Ivan Lendl, Boris Becker, Mats Wilander, Martina Navratilova and Steffi Graf. The game includes six tournaments, including the Australian Open, Wimbledon and the U.S. Open, and offers play on grass, clay, and hardcourts, as well as a unique "cosmo" surface that takes place in outer space with astronaut ballboys.

There are three modes of play to choose from: exhibition, tournament and world tour. Exhibition mode consists of a single exhibition match for one or two players, while Tournament mode allows up to eight players to face off in a singles tourney. Both of these modes also include a "Watch" option, in which all players are controlled by the computer. World Tour mode takes the player through an entire year on tour playing against computer-controlled opponents, using a password save system. Doubles matches aren't available in any mode though.

name: The Crimson Flower that Divides: Lunar Coupling
description: A fictional world that's full of exoticism. This is a romance adventure game for women that depicts rich romantic relationships that involve the character's countries, along with conflicts and beliefs.

name: Together We Live
description: Kyoya awakens in a dimly lit room. According to the girl who happened to pass by, the world has perished. Reluctant to believe, Kyoya sets off with the girl to search for other living beings, journeying through the ruined world together. However, the girl had a purpose. To atone for the sins of humanity, she must continue to die. Again and again, dozens of times, hundreds of times, thousands of times, tens of thousands of times. She dies and then comes back to life. As he watches her, who knows only suffering, Kyoya starts to desire to teach her about happiness. Together We Live is a new version of the visual novel Stand By You, featuring completely redrawn graphics and a new improved translation.

name: Half-Life: Peaces Like Us
description: Half-Life: Peaces Like Us is a singleplayer modification for Half-Life, by Koumei Satou with a Xen setting.

name: The Ship
description: Imagine a game in which you don't know who to trust, you don't know who may be about to kill you, in fact you don't even know who is human and who is artificial. Played online, your quarry is another human player but can you find them amongst the AI inhabitants of the Ship? Once you know who they are, find yourself a weapon but keep an eye out for security guards and cameras. If you're spotted trying to murder someone you'll be transported to the Brig and suffer a hefty fine. If you succeed in killing your quarry Mr. X will reward you with a cash prize, depending on how entertaining he found your murder. At the same time you must look after yourself, wash, sleep, eat and have fun and remember - always look over your shoulder because somewhere there's a player looking for you!

name: En Route 66
description: Jose Reynolds, a journalist, for the “Santa Fe Times” in New Mexico, obtains interesting information from his sources, that a few hours ago, not far from “Route 66″, strange animals were found dead. Without hesitation, he left the office and hit the road, riding the highway, and after some time came across one of these…

name: Catalyst: Blind Faith
description:
In an apocalyptic world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, not only do you determine how you explore the ruins that cover the land. You control and shape the fate of a young and troubled priest who can channel the power of any God in the pantheon through his weakened and fractured body.

While you seek a cure for the phenomenon turning mankind into demons— the Catalyst— you are encouraged to follow your heart.

Dive deep into a harrowing, action-packed, dark fantasy and horror visual novel, driven by a narrative that your choices create.

name: Gladiator Rising
description:
​Fight through five Chapters of constantly changing, randomly generated gladiators
Buy, equip and use items as you compete to become the ultimate warrior
Strategy is key to success in this mix of rogue-like and turn-based RPG mix with Hand Crafted Pixel Graphics, Permadeath, Lots of items, Learn 30+ unique spells and more!

name: Hakuoki Yuugiroku DS
description: A DS port.

name: Ever17
description: Ever17 is a remake of "Ever17: The Out of Infinity", developed in collaboration between 5pb. and CyberFront. This remake, among other things, features a significantly rewritten script, re-done voice acting, a remixed soundtrack, and animated 3D models to replace the static character sprites of the original.

name: Hakuoki Yuugiroku 2: Matsuribayashi to Taishi-tachi
description: Sequel to Hakuoki Yuugiroku.

name: Hakuoki Shinkai: Ten'un no Shou
description: A sequel to Ginsei no Shou and Tsukikage no Shou. This time, the story takes place in Kyoto, where the Shinsengumi were active in the past, and spins the story of their youth and memories that were not depicted in the main story, including incidents of various sizes that are recounted along with the events of the four seasons.

name: Lightning
description: Fast-paced competitive FPS with character abilities. combining realistic settings with superpowers. geared toward esport.

name: Kevin Costner's Waterworld
description:
A large scale real imagining of the 'fake' Waterworld arcade game that Milhouse plays during a 10 second joke in a 1997 episode of The Simpsons.

All the greatest and most memorable parts of the movie are recreated here in Simpsons videogame form!

name: Neo Angelique Special
description: Fully voiced and added omake events for the characters from the Neo Angelique Abyss anime: Mathias, Erenfreed, Jet, and Roche.

name: Friday Night Funkin': The Trollge Files
description: The Trollge Files is a horror mod for Friday Night Funkin' directed by Malicious Bunny about Agent Blueballs, an agent for the Trollge Containment Facility who trap and contain corrupted trolls. When Agent Blueballs is tasked to take down a particularly dangerous troll, he gets trapped inside his own subconscious and has to face his inner demons one by one to escape, and save his world.

name: Zorax
description: Zorax is an action shooter game about a fearless space warrior that should conquer Planet Zorax, freeing it from a terrible curse.

name: Nextbots In Backrooms: Obunga
description:
Nextbot is what will haunt you. Run from the trends in the worst place in the Backrooms. The scariest and most challenging account awaits you ahead.

You'll have to survive the pursuit in the Backrooms. Beware, the enemy will not be alone, there are many of them. They are cunning and nimble, you will not have time to react in time and lose. Huge mazes, incomprehensible corridors and scary corners await you. Compete with friends for time.

name: Idle Cyber Dungeon
description: This is a Cyberpunk style role-playing game. Players don't need a lot of operations, they just need to think about some strategies to complete the victory.

name: Valkkryes: Ashes of War
description: Play Valkkryes: Ashes Of War, Infiltrate strategic locations, gather supplies and be armed, alert and alive to become the hero who stands tall on the battlefields. Drop a lot of traps and surprise objects while collecting reinforcements,

name: 2048 Farmer in the Dell
description: This is the classic game 2048 with music pictures and sounds related to the farmer in the dell nursery rhyme.

name: Cubether
description: In Cubether, the jelly cubes must work together to pass a level. Each of the cubes moves in a different way and to get to some platforms you need to use the capabilities of another cube. name: Yuukyuu no Campanella
description:
The kingdom of Atlastia --

North of the world, there's a group of flying islands - this is where the flying continent of Atlastia and its well-known titular kingdom is located. And not only in Atlastia itself - everywhere across the flying islands - the legend of a particular clan is being passed down from generation to generation.

The legendary heroes clan, "Oasis."

Even though they had saved the continent 100 years ago, their sub-commander Chester Silver has laid dormant for ages now. Now, about 100 years have passed and as Chester wakes up from his long arduous slumber he...

...bears witness to the Idol Princess Claria singing her songs to entertain the public. He wakes up as being one of her supporters cheering her on.

And then --

Spurred on by Claria's admiration for the Heroes Clan "Oasis," Chester Silver gathers his former companions, the twin sisters Angelique and Juliet Gilbert, to embark on a new adventure.

At the same time, a mysterious woman who had woken up from her slumber in the crypt of a ruin, Colette says:

"Now that Colette has woken up, this world's fate is sealed."

Strange incidents begin to occur in the world and with the causality of 100 years past intertwining, the adventure Chester seeks is closer than he thinks.

name: Pokémon Emerald Rogue
description:
Ever wondered what Pokemon might look like as a Roguelike? When you go on an adventure all routes, encounters and items will be procedurally chosen based on your progress into a run. After a certain number of routes you will encounter a random gym leader who will have a procedurally chosen team of their assigned type; as you progress further into a run gym leaders and other trainers will start using more difficult setups for their pokemon. If you can make it all the way to the champion and defeat them, then you will have completed the run!

Once you complete or wipe out of a run you will go back to a hub area where you can buy permanent items and catch new "starter" Pokemon to use in the next run. As you progress further into the run, you will unlock more buildings/NPCs in this hub area to use for preparing the next run.

The player controls the protagonists of Stardust Crusaders in a combination of Point and click adventure and classic third-person RPG. It is sometimes also referred to as a side-scrolling RPG.

name: Deathwatch
description:
Deathwatch is a horror game in which you are tasked to observe haunted locations, log supernatural events and eradicate any potential paranormal threats.
You'll need to keep a keen eye on every camera and even your present location for any supernatural occurrences. Possible events vary from Audio to Victims and paranormal sightings, plus many more. Using your computer systems you must log each event to gather enough data to eliminate the entity, before it eliminates you!
Deathwatch puts you in a vulnerable state where your only chance of survival is to successfully log enough supernatural events in order to survive the night. You need to constantly be aware of your own surroundings because you may not be the only one observing.

All this is to provide the player with dynamic multiplayer spaceship combat. In the game, you take on the role of a spaceship pilot - Star Hero - who, along with his team, competes against other players in one of two modes: Adventure Mode or Ranked Mode.

Both modes are skill-based and free to play, as we believe sustainable economy needs to be based on the fun arising from playing a game rather than playing to earn.

name: Gyakuten Saiban
description:
Gyakuten Saiban is a visual novel adventure game developed by Capcom Production Studio 4 and published by Capcom. It was released in 2001 for the Game Boy Advance.

The story follows Phoenix Wright, a rookie defense attorney who attempts to have his clients declared "not guilty". Among other characters are Phoenix's boss, Mia Fey; his assistant and Mia's sister, Maya; and prosecutor Miles Edgeworth. The player controls Phoenix through two sets of sections: investigations and courtroom trials. During investigations they gather information and evidence. During trials they cross-examine witnesses, and answer questions from the judge, the prosecutor, and the witnesses. The story is split into four cases.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
description: The port of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney released for Wii as WiiWare. This version is a straight port of the game, but with the touch mechanics ported and some small motion control added in their place.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
description: Phoenix Wright's obscure mobile debut, released in an episodic format with the first episode acting as a free demo and the rest of the game having to be purchased from the now defunct Capcom World service. Naturally, some sacrifices were made to make the game work within the limitations of the platform. Noticeably the character sprites aren't animated, but they still managed to include the classic sound bites and vibrating objections. Unfortunately, everything past the first episode seems to have been lost to time.

name: Gyakuten Saiban
description: A straight port of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney released in Japan as an episodical game.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney

name: Gyakuten Saiban 2
description: Gyakuten Saiban 2 (original version of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Justice for All) is a visual novel adventure video game. It was originally released for the Game Boy Advance in 2002 in Japan. The game is the second entry in the Ace Attorney series, following Gyakuten Saiban (Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney).

name: Gyakuten Saiban 3
description:
The third installment of the Gyakuten Saiban/Ace Attorney series of text adventure video games. It is the last installment in the Gyakuten Saiban Trilogy. In addition to featuring three episodes in which Phoenix Wright faces off against a mysterious new prosecutor named Godot, the game also features the first two cases of Mia Fey's law career.

Like the other two games in the trilogy, it was first a Game Boy Advance exclusive title and only released in Japan (until the Nintendo DS port in 2007).

Ananke is an adventure and exploration game set in the premises of a strange company.

Who are you? Why have you been sent to work there? And what is Exafan Consulting exactly doing?

Explore the company, talk the employees, find out what's going on... But try to be discrete or else snooping around could lead to dramatic consequences.
Ananke is an innovative narrative experience built around a first-person pixel art engine.

Each track features hair-raising, jaw-dropping, heart-in-the-mouth dips and drops.

name: Mad Stalker: Full Metal Forth
description:
Mad Stalker is Fill-In Cafe’s first attempt at a beat-em-up. Designed and programmed by Masatoshi Imaizumi and Masaki Ukyo, its systems are loosely similar to the Asuka 120% Burning Fest series, whose first entry was released later in 1994. There are three main versions: the X68000 and FM Towns games, developed by Fill-In Cafe themselves (the X68000 version has the subtitle Full Metal Forth, which was corrected to Full Metal Force in the FM Towns and later entries); the PC Engine CD port developed by Kogado; and the PlayStation version, again by Fill-In Cafe, which is more of a complete remake than a port.

A conversion for the Mega Drive was in development and previewed, however it did not receive an official release to the public until Columbus Circle published it in September 2020.

description: Hypogean is a 2D action rpg with a heavy emphasis on story that bolsters a unique combat system allowing for flexibility and player expression.
